text: [Dar oƣoz] Mardum çuz ummati vohid [va jaktoparast] naʙudand, sipas ixtilof kardand.Va agar peştar [dar mavridi muhlat ʙa gunahgoron va hisoʙrasī dar qijomat] suxane az çoniʙi Parvardigorat ʙajon naşuda ʙud, jaqinan, [dar hamin dunjo] dar ʙorai onci ʙo ham ixtilof mekunand, mijonaşon dovarī meşud
